regen.absent_element: email alerts after multiple failed login attempts
regen.new_specification: The system shall send an email alert to the System Administrator upon multiple failed login attempts from the same user.

regen.absent_element: Immediate protective measures after alerting about multiple failed login attempts
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically disable the user account temporarily after alerting the System Administrator of multiple failed login attempts.

regen.absent_element: the alert should be sent via email
regen.new_specification: The system shall send an email alert to the System Administrator for multiple failed login attempts from the same user.

label: These warnings are sent to the System Administrator.
absence: action of sending warnings for failed login
